Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 08:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
